      • doesUserExist

        public boolean doesUserExist(java.lang.String path,
                             UserParameters currentUser)
        Method checking if user whose parameters are in "currentUser" variable is existing in database that is placed in text file in "path".
        Specified by:
        doesUserExist in interface DataBaseReading
        Parameters:
        path - the path of file in which the database is placed
        currentUser - single record in database describing user
        Returns:
        true if the database cotains user and false if it does not

      • userHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> userHistory(UserParameters userParams)
        Method to get and return history of counting of the specific user. Not to use in txt file kind of database!
        Specified by:
        userHistory in interface DataBaseReading
        Parameters:
        userParams - single record in database representing user
        Returns:
        list of polynomials and its derivatives
